english.segment1: The day is brighter here with You. The night is lighter than it's hue. Would lead me to believe. Which leads me to believe
english.segment2: (chorus). You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. And I am Yours. What does that make me?
english.segment3: My eyes are small but they have seen. the beauty of enormous things. Which leads me to believe. there's light enough to see that
english.segment4: (chorus). You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. And I am Yours
english.segment5: From glory to glory. You are glorious You are glorious. From glory to glory. You are glorious. You are glorious. Which leads me to believe. why I can believe that
english.segment6: . You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. And I am Yours. You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. And I am Yours
english.segment7: From glory to glory From glory to glory. You are glorious. You are glorious. You are glorious. You are glorious.
english.segment8: You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. You make everything glorious. And I am Yours
